column4: has anyone else here installed the AMD64 and realized - too late - the conspicuous absence of a Flash plugin and Wine? Is there an easy "downgrade" to 32bit?
but is not locating your HOME directory on, say, a separate HDD kinda a nifty/ smart idea? perhaps not a separate HDD that Windows(tm) is gonna have its' way with, however....
I've tried wine several times, most recently yesterday.  It just isn't ready, as far as I can see.
- how is that done? changing his home directory, i mean
